attributes.action: Investigate Cafcass being bias towards the mother and using unproven accusations
attributes.background:
Thousands of men are unfairly interviewed by Cafcass who are continuinly bias towards the mother. They use unproven accusations and heresay as their argument and are aggressive in their interviewing tactics. 
Cafcass are supposed to be unbias and the whole organisation needs investigating.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
